content: The diff will achieve the desired outcome. The interactive wizard works correctly (verified by passing unit tests), produces valid ScenarioFile JSON, and integrates cleanly into the CLI entrypoint. The output can be piped to a file as described in the issue. All 48 tests pass. The only gap is the absence of a CLI-level happy-path test for the wizard, but this is a pragmatic tradeoff given the difficulty of testing interactive TTY prompts from a subprocess. The feature is ready for use.
